core:assignAction.core:comment:
We must set the source id for sequence number generation to be this device. This will be used in completeTransaction when the sequence number is assigned. Especially important if the transaction is being recalled from RJ otherwise we will sequence off an RJ device id.
TODO This code code be moved into a common place in the CreateHandlerForLoad process or into the recallTransaction method of the the transaction handlers (though being careful to avoid the 'read-only' case where the transaction is simply being loaded for viewing).

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: fail with enquiry outcome set to null, assume offline
